post.body: I think people are wanting me to review the new gen MacBook pro arriving tomorrow.

The MacBook Pro will be here tomorrow. It's my first pro mac laptop since a PowerBook about 3 years ago. Looking forward to it.
Real review from an Amazon customer: "This toy is like another member of the family."
When I was a child, things like this weren't even possible - http://www.backtobasicstoys.com/images/6869.jpg
None of my toys made electronic sounds, and yet I've been able to exist in modern society just fine. I can even turn on a TV.
Why do toy manufacturers think that all toys for small children should make electronic sounds
We thought you'd like to know that we shipped your items, and that this completes your order.
Despite many "real" toys, my 12 month old son's favorite toy is an empty cardboard diaper box.
Anybody remember Kai's Power Tools?
